subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|手|alt1=扌|t1=hand|詹|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to carry by hand.

subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=dān
|c=daam1
|h=pfs=tâm
|md=dăng
|mn=taⁿ/tam
|mn_note=taⁿ - vernacular; tam - literary
|mn-t=dam1/dang1/dan1
|mn-t_note=dam1/dang1 - literary (dang1 - Chenghai); dan1 - vernacular
|w=1te,1'ne
|w_note=1'ne - variant, possibly influenced by {{zh-l|*拿}}, used in e.g. {{zh-l|*擔伊做脫}}
|mc=1
|oc=1,1
|cat=v
}}
